    • Method Detail

      • delayedReconnect

        public void delayedReconnect()
        Attempts to reconnect to socket every 1000 ms. Reconnecting is taking max 1000 ms and takes place in separate thread. This method is called in onClose(int, String, boolean) when current socket connection is lost - when socket is closed.

      • sendMessage

        private void sendMessage​(java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String topic,
                         java.lang.String message)
        Send an message to socket. Message is formatted as JSON object and consists of type, topic and message attributes. This method is meant to send only one message to the PubSub component of the Tracking System. That happens when socket connection is established. Message should be indicating that the current socket is subscribing to all the messages that will arrive to topic defined in ACCOUNTS_TOPIC. See more at https://github.com/dejvv/trackingsystem.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of message. Possible values are PUBLISH, SUBSCRIBE, UNSUBSCRIBE, UNSUBSCRIBEALL.
        topic - All messages that are published to the given topic will be received by the current socket (if type is SUBSCRIBE). If type is PUBLISH message will be published to the given topic.
        message - If not null, represents message that is send to PubSub component of the Tracking System.
